We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private FilteredIdentity _filteredidentity;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_filteredidentity = FilteredIdentity(symbol, resolution);

// In OnData()
if (_filteredidentity.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "FilteredIdentity Current", _filteredidentity.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.filteredidentity = self.FilteredIdentity(symbol, resolution)

# In OnData()
if self.filteredidentity.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "FilteredIdentity Current", self.filteredidentity.Current);
